title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/1/19
itunes:title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/1/19
description:
George Noory and researcher P.M.H. Atwater explore her groundbreaking study into the lifelong impact of near death experiences during childhood, and how it can lead to advanced intellect and emotional issues when the victims reached adulthood.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
